I`m Melanie, a quantitative ecologist at [Aarhus University](https://pure.au.dk/portal/en/persons/melanie-tietje(6abaa223-a82b-4577-acce-f2ead58ba86b).html), currently working in the [TropiToL project](https://peb-group.net/trf) where we are exploring large-scale biodiversity patterns in plants, combining geographic and phylogenetic data. 
I have worked on extinction risk influencing factors, geographic range size patterns, diversity, the combination of climatic with biological data and recently phylogenies.
